\section*{Simpson积分}

\begin{verbatim}
function csans = SimpsonCS(n,left,right)
    x = uniform(n,left,right);
    y = assign(n,x);
    temp=0;
    for i = 1:1:(n-3)
        temp=temp+(y(i+2)+4*y(i+1)+y(i))*(x(i+1)-x(i))/6;
    end
    csans = temp;

end
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}输入参数的数目不足。

出错 SimpsonCS (第 5 行)
    x = uniform(n,left,right);
\end{verbatim} \color{black}
    


\end{document}
